comprehensive_overview: Advntr (Adaptive Variant Detection in NGS data with trained Recurrent Neural Networks) is a software tool that utilizes deep learning techniques to identify genetic variants in next-generation sequencing (NGS) data. It employs trained recurrent neural networks to accurately and efficiently detect variants in DNA sequences.
core_features: Utilizes deep learning methods for variant detection
Trained recurrent neural networks for improved accuracy
Efficient and fast variant detection process
